result.reason: Save/restore custom panel layouts already implemented in fork — View menu has Load Layout (dropdown with saved names + file picker) and Save Layout, backed by DockPanelLayoutSaver/Loader with named XML files in Settings/Layouts/
result.approach: Already implemented. Mark as released in next release — View > Load Layout / Save Layout menu items persist named panel arrangements to XML files.

attempts.raw_output:
The feature is **already implemented** in this fork. The codebase has full save/restore panel layout support:

- `DockPanelLayoutSaver.SaveLayout(name)` / `DeleteLayout(name)`
- `DockPanelLayoutLoader.LoadLayoutByName(name)` / `GetLayoutNames()`
- `ViewMenu` with "Load Layout" dropdown and "Save Layout..." menu items
- `ConnectionWindow` persistence with title + connection IDs via `GetContentFromPersistString`
